text: Karl Wirsum (1939 â€“ May 6, 2021) was an American artist who was a member of the Chicago artistic group The Hairy Who, and helped set the foundation for Chicago's art scene in the 1970s. Although he was primarily a painter, he also worked with prints, sculpture, and even digital art. Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Artists from Chicago
title: Karl Wirsum
